description: React component for a Signup page that allows users to create an account using email and password, interacting with authentication context, handling form submission, and navigation.

methods.name: Signup()
methods.description: React functional component rendering the signup form, managing state for email, password, error message, and handling form submission.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Event handler for form submission, performs signup via auth context, and navigates on success or displays error message.
